subject: Add Vitest tests for integration_context three-tier fallback
description:
Added 14 new tests for integration_context three-tier fallback chain covering assigned_to_id, business_unit_id, campaign_id extraction and fallback behavior.

Evidence:
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.edge-cases.test.ts:1118`: `describe("integration_context Pre-Resolved IDs"...`
- Tests cover: assigned_to_id extraction, null fallback, falsy-but-valid (0), campaign_id extraction, business_unit_id three-tier fallback (integration_context -> field_mappings -> null), all-three-together, partial context, webhook format
- Verification: `bunx vitest run` - 209 tests passed (was 195), 0 failures
